deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 1 hr 17 mins
features: 1.[Long Handled And Extension Pole] You can choose the length of the broom according to the height of the child or adult.Makes you more comfortable and sweeps the floor without bending over,home and apartment essentials!

2.[2023 New Design] The broom and dustpan combo set built in scraper and comb teeth can easily scrape off garbage and hair which on bristles of the broom into dustpan.Not need your hands to clean up,avoid getting your hands dirty! And the dustpan uniquely added dust cover,the bristle of the broom is increased from three rows to four rows.
3.[Convenient Storage & Save Space] Broom snaps into clip on dustpan Handle to upright,so this upright dustpan and broom Combo will save your space and keep your house clean and tidy.

4.[Wind-proof Dustpan with Flexible Lip] Micro curve soft and flexible rubber lip making a strong seal between floor and dustpan, the dustpan can cling to the ground closed and very flat, so dust will not sweep under the dust pans.

5.[Good Quality] Broom and dustpan set for home made from environmentally friendly recycled PET and new ABS material, Make this dustpan and broom combo set life longer.The handle of this dustpan and brush set is made of Class-A stainless steel which is not easy to rust and deform!

6.[After sales service] This dustpan and broom combo set have passed US 21 Security projects testing,if broom set breaks or it's damaged in shipping, or even if you change your mind, please simply let us know（how to: click on your order--contact seller), we will either replace it or full refund, your choice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow! More than what I expected!
reviews.reviewText: I originally bought this dustpan and broom because of the long hand of the pan. I needed a long handled one for our trailer in a campground to help me pick up the leaves outside. Getting lazy and old and don't want to bend down that far. I received it in the mail and put it together in 5 minutes! So easy! It is really well made and sturdy. Like that the broom attaches to the pan as it saves space.I apparently did not read the whole description as I did not see that it has a comb piece that cleans the broom of dust and anything else that gets stuck in the broom. No need to get my hands dirty or take out the vacuum to clean the broom! Now the broom....It is wonderful as well. Long handle and it actually picks up all the crumbs, dog hair and left over dog food that our dog tries to hide. I honestly wasn't thinking it was going to be as good as it is.This is so great that this one is staying here in our home and I will have to buy another one for the trailer. Our old broom is now strictly for the outside deck and porch! Great dustpan and broom set!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great broom and dustpan!
reviews.reviewText: This is the best broom to me! Super easy to assemble. Very light weight and awsome length so you would never need to bend down. The best part for this broom is made of awsome mertarials that means it is super easy to collect my dog's fur on the floor and won't stick on the broom which is a big surprise to me! Save my life and super enjoy swapping the floor because I have to clean the floor every day by thanking for my precious Cookie's fur. I've been used a few old brooms and this one is the best for me! The broom is enough hard but soft at the same time that is crazy to describe this feeling to collect the furs on the floor then just push them into the dustpan easily and pull up the broom on the upper of the dustpan so everythin will be off. Perfect design!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I thought it was good ... BUT
reviews.reviewText: Update 7-29-23I contacted the seller and immediately they expressed a sincere apology and offered a full refund without even asking. So thank you for a kind and pleasant interaction.Update 7-27-23I thought this was a pretty decent sweeper + dustpan combo but I have only used it a few times and already the broom head will not stay tightened to the "stick". Also on the dustpan, the stick is not wanting to stay tightened to the bucket part either. It's not as bad as the broom but they are both an issue! The broom def is a BIG problem bc I can't even efficiently sweep bc the head is always loose and jiggles and feels like it's gonna detach when I'm trying to sweep something up ! Unfortunately my 30 days is up but I just messaged the seller. We'll see if they make things right ?!This set was easy to put together and seems to be of good quality. The dustpan "bucket" is pretty sturdy. The pole connecting the handle and bucket feels a little chincy but seems to be durable enough but I really have not used it much. The dustpan has a bent upsidedown L shape so it grips pretty good. The comb part of the dustpan seems to be pretty efficient and sturdy. It does a good job of cleaning the bristles of the broom. The pole of the broom is made of that same iffy thin metal as the dustpan. Don't get me wrong it's not horrible, it's just if there's a weak point in this set it's those. But the broom head is pretty solid, nice thick bristles. As you see in the pictures I chose the gray & bright orange configuration. I think it looks pretty good overall. Not that it's really easy to misplace but the orange stands out. LoL so overall it's pretty decent especially considering when I bought this it was one of the cheaper options.*Idk if they still use the photo of someone standing on the bucket of the dustpan in the listing but I wouldn't recommend it ! It's sturdy but not THAT sturdy 😂 🤣

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most important is that it does the job it's suppose to do as described
reviews.reviewText: I really like this broom and mop set. It does exactlly what it's suppose to do and was really easy to put together. Sturdy and well made. Good price for this set and looks exactly as pictured. I also liked the fact that it takes up little or no room to store and hangs on the wall very nicely. If looking for a convenient way to sweep and pick up sweeping without having to bend, this does exactly that! I definitely recommend. Don't hesitate----Buy it----You'll be glad you did! I love this set! Very satisfied customer with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everything goes in the dust pan!!!
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this broom and the dust pan actually works as advertised, everything gets sweeped up. Its well made. When you add the broom to the holder, it stands upright without needing any outside support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best little broom set ever.
reviews.reviewText: Bought this on line ( cancer won't let go shopping and hubs just don't get it) was afraid it was going to be flimsy, had a choice of getting this one or letting hubs pick me one out. This little thing is nothing short AWESOME, sturdy, easy to put together and you can remove the broom handle and have a whisk. 💯

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I searched heavy duty dust pan. These seem very flimsy the hand poles come in sections you screw together and are made from really light gauge metal. Time will tell if they hold up very long. Also they don’t stand up in their own. They all over

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple, good quality, easy to store.
reviews.reviewText: This broom and dustpan have been perfect for my garage for cleaning dust in nooks and crannies. The dustpan has a clip that allows the broom to attach to it for easy storage. For anyone looking for a broom/dustpan set that doesn't take up space, this is perfect!

I find the product works really well and when you have a bad back, any extra help is a bonus. With regard to the lip not touching the floor as some have mentioned, the instructions actually state how to resolve this. You just tip the broom up and press the plastic down to bend it so it is more flush with the floor. You only have to do this when the product is new.
Eassy to handle. Decently we can keep any corner place in the houses.

reviews.reviewTitle: Everything I want but a bit on the heavy side
reviews.reviewText: Great quality but made of metal so heavier than those plastic ones

reviews.reviewTitle: Scoop have curve which leaves dust on floor.
reviews.reviewText: Scoop have curve which doesnot clears all dust and dirty. Short handle for broom and dust scoop. Materila quality is good. But due to faulty this product is useless. Not recommended.
I ordered grey and red..they delivered other colour...both pan and broom or of normal broom height..so don't serve the purpose.
